name: Something In The Fog
description:
Something In The Fog is a horror game based on an intense fog and an action that takes place at night in a forest. Your goal will be to recover one or more golden keys at the current level then find a magic portal that takes you to the next level if you have the required number of keys. But beware, in a forest, you are never alone ...

Gameplay time : approximately 3 Hours

Note : the price of the game is 0.99€. This amount will help me to product better games for the community, I hope you will enjoy Something In The Fog ! :)

The game is now available for Windows & Linux . You can download it on this page !
